paragraphs.first: My name is Ruben, I'm 22, and I'm currently in Computer Engineering school in the Paris Area.
paragraphs.second: I’ve always been curious and love to experiment with new tech, new tools and new programming languages.
paragraphs.third: I’ve been programming from an early age, and I’ve written and published a number of apps and programs (Discord Bots, VSCode Extensions, and websites).
